targets.rawSql:
with range_counts_ts as (
    select time_bucket('4h', datetime) as datetime,
        intarray_sum_elements_agg(balance_usd_ranges_counts) as balance_usd_ranges_counts
    from data_report.vault_stats_4h_ts
    where $__timeFilter(datetime)
      and chain = '$chain'
      and vault_id in ($vault_id)
    group by 1
)
select datetime as time,
    case 
        when ranges.investment_range is null then null
        when ranges.investment_range = 1 then '01) < $0'
        when ranges.investment_range = 2 then '02) = $0'
        when ranges.investment_range = 3 then '03) ($0 ; $10)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 4 then '04) [$10 ; $100)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 5 then '05) [$100 ; $1k)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 6 then '06) [$1k ; $5k)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 7 then '07) [$5k ; $10k)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 8 then '08) [$10k ; $25k)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 9 then '09) [$25k ; $50k)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 10 then '10) [$50k ; $100k)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 11 then '11) [$100k ; $500k)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 12 then '12) [$500k ; $1m)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 13 then '13) [$1m ; $10m)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 14 then '14) +$10m'
                                          else 'error'
    end as investment_range,
  sum(ranges.investor_count) as investor_count
from range_counts_ts, lateral (
    select investor_count, investment_range
    from unnest(range_counts_ts.balance_usd_ranges_counts) with ordinality as ranges(investor_count, investment_range)
) as ranges
where ranges.investor_count is not null
group by 1,2
order by 1

panels.title: Investment size group by user by vault

targets.rawSql:
with range_counts_ts as (
    select time_bucket('4h', datetime) as datetime,
        intarray_sum_elements_agg(balance_usd_ranges_counts) as balance_usd_ranges_counts
    from data_report.vault_stats_4h_ts
    where $__timeFilter(datetime)
      and chain = '$chain'
      and vault_id in ($vault_id)
    group by 1
)
select datetime as time,
    case 
        when ranges.investment_range is null then null
        when ranges.investment_range = 1 then '01) < $0'
        when ranges.investment_range = 2 then '02) = $0'
        when ranges.investment_range = 3 then '03) ($0 ; $10)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 4 then '04) [$10 ; $100)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 5 then '05) [$100 ; $1k)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 6 then '06) [$1k ; $5k)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 7 then '07) [$5k ; $10k)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 8 then '08) [$10k ; $25k)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 9 then '09) [$25k ; $50k)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 10 then '10) [$50k ; $100k)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 11 then '11) [$100k ; $500k)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 12 then '12) [$500k ; $1m)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 13 then '13) [$1m ; $10m)'
        when ranges.investment_range = 14 then '14) +$10m'
                                          else 'error'
    end as investment_range,
  sum(ranges.investor_count) as investor_count
from range_counts_ts, lateral (
    select investor_count, investment_range
    from unnest(range_counts_ts.balance_usd_ranges_counts) with ordinality as ranges(investor_count, investment_range)
) as ranges
where ranges.investor_count is not null
group by 1,2
order by 1

panels.title: Investment size group by user by vault

list.definition: select distinct vault_id from data_raw.vault where chain = '$chain'
list.name: vault_id
list.query: select distinct vault_id from data_raw.vault where chain = '$chain'
